name: Machoke
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: As a result of its continual workouts, it has developed tremendous power. It uses that power to help people with their work.

abilities.name: Daunting Pose
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon by your opponent’s attacks. Your opponent’s attacks and Abilities can’t place damage counters on your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cross Chop
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
